alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:03PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SAMPSON COUNTY THROUGH 930 PM EST... At 902 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rowan, or 18 miles east of Elizabethtown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harrells and Ivanhoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. Be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
